sticky.description: Whether to turn on the anchor ceiling

sticky-offset-top.description: The distance from the top of the anchor when it is raised
sticky-offset-top.type: 锚点吸顶时与顶部的距离
sticky-offset-top.description_zh: 锚点吸顶时与顶部的距离

hide-list.description: Whether to hide the list of anchors

sticky-css-mode.type: 开启原生 css sticky 模式
sticky-css-mode.description_zh: 开启原生 `css sticky` 模式

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll to the specified anchor point

IndexBarScrollToOptions.name: event
IndexBarScrollToOptions.description: 值为 `false` 时阻止触发 `change` 事件

events.name: click

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the currently highlighted index character changes
